body_html:
@zheng-xq I am using Cuda 7.5 and two gcc versions installled - 4.9 and 5.2. the cuda located in /usr/local/cuda has it's gcc linked to gcc-4.9.
(gcc incompatibility earlier occured with theano and issue was solved after the linking)

body:
@zheng-xq I am using Cuda 7.5 and two gcc versions installled - 4.9 and 5.2. the cuda located in /usr/local/cuda has it's gcc _linked_ to gcc-4.9.
(gcc incompatibility earlier occured with theano and issue was solved after the linking)
